interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 3D Mink Eyelashes Natural Long Lashes 2 in 1 Self-adhesive Eyeliner Instead of Adhesive 5 Different Styles Pairs Kits Sets with Tweezers , NO NEED GLUE
Review Date: 2020/07/30
Store: PURELEOR
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'PURELEOR', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Unit Count': '5.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '750810450143'}
Review Text: I am terrible at doing lashes but I really like having nice lashes, now during pandemic lash salon is out of the question. Before trying these I tried lashes with glue and that was a disaster. Then ai tried magnetic ones and that was a good experience. When these came up for the review I honestly didn’t understand how different it is then a glue? Well, it’s the application process that’s different. With glue you have to squeeze it out and make sure not to put  too much, then you have to make sure to place the lash correctly on the first attempt or you might have glue on your eye lid. This liner serves as a glue! It’s just like regular liner, has that sharpie tip and works like a pen. You draw your line over the eye lid and then place the lashes and they will stick to it perfectly. If you need to reposition the lash there is no mees and glue residue, you just pull and place it back accordingly. I only wish these would be more natural style but for the ladies that like their lashes little more dramatic this is perfect choice.
Review Title: Beginner friendly application
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
LUBEX UV LED Nail Lamp Nail Dryer Light, 54W Professional Nail Curing Lamp Nail Light for Gel Polish with 30s/60s/99s Timer, Gel Nail Machine with Auto Sensor LCD Screen with Anti-UV Gloves Offered LUBEX {'Style': 'Traditional', 'Brand': 'LUBEX', 'Special Feature': 'Motion Sensor', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Connectivity Technology': 'IR', 'Package Dimensions': '8.6 x 5.9 x 3.7 inches; 1.3 Pounds'} I like this lamp. It cures evenly and it’s base is large enough to take hand or foot without the danger of damaging polish while putting it in. It came with the fingerless glove for hand protection and I thought that was pretty neat. It’s supposed to protect the skin from tanning. I never had a glove before. It also came with the 2 nail files. It’s a smart lamp, when the temperature gets high, it will turn to low-power mode to protect the hand, light kinda dims. When temperature gets down, the lamp goes back to normal work mode. When you out your hand in it automatically goes for 120sec, other presets are 39/60/90 sec. Instruction manual is pretty good.
Overall it’s a good lamp and I recommend. Bonus for small details as nail file and the glove. Nice unit, dries evenly LilySilk Large Silk Scrunchies for Womens Girls Kids, Green, Pure 100 Real Natural Raw Mulberry Raw Silk, 6A Grade, Beautiful for Hair, Soft, Tie Scrunchies Silk Big Giant LilySilk {'Package Dimensions': '7.9 x 6.4 x 1.2 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'RDUS6111H-02A'} This is large scrunchie with a lot of ruffle. Color is beautiful dark green and the fabric has a great shine to it, it’s silks nature and looks great The elastic inside is quite stretchy and I wrap this around my hair in tail for 3 times. It holds my hair well but I still feel it should be stronger for a large ponytail. I can see this looking great on a hair bun. profile:
**User Profile Summary**

- **Product Preference**: Maintains a strong preference for nail care devices with advanced features such as timers and automatic sensors, and has recently shown interest in easy-to-use eyelash products. The user continues to enjoy hair accessories like high-quality silk scrunchies.

- **Style & Functionality**: Appreciates traditional styles enhanced with smart technology, demonstrating versatile taste that spans nail care, hair accessories, and now beauty tools such as self-adhesive eyeliner.

- **User Experience Focus**: Values product effectiveness, particularly in achieving desired looks without complex application processes. The recent interaction highlights a desire for user-friendly beauty solutions that facilitate a positive experience.

- **Additional Features**: Recognizes the importance of thoughtful product design, noting the convenience of complimentary accessories and user-friendly features applicable to a broader range of beauty products, including comfortable and efficient lash application.

- **Quality & Reliability**: Rates products highly for their effectiveness, safety, and overall value. The recent purchase reinforces a consistent focus on quality across all product categories.

- **Easy Use**: Enjoys products with straightforward instructions and simple operations, whether in nail care, hair styling, or makeup application, reflecting a holistic approach to personal care that emphasizes user comfort and convenience.

Overall, the user seeks quality, safety, and ease of use across a diverse range of personal care items, capturing an evolving interest in enhancing beauty routines with practical tools.
